search.query: `sourcelog` OXO_Direction="-->" OXO_Dialled_Number="08*" | `OXO_MACRO_Padding` | lookup OXO_Special_Call_Number_FR.csv OXO_Dialled_Number OUTPUTNEW "Tarification_Prefix" | `FR_DetailCall_RENAME` | rename "Tarification_Prefix" AS "Tarification" | table "Date" "Heure" "Nom Utilisateur" "Numéro Composé" "Tarification" "Durée"
